name: Couleur
description:
Couleur is a chill game about filling a barren wasteland with color. It was made in 2 days for "Mini Jam 111 Colors". 

Tutorial:

It is a pretty simple game all you have to do is fill segments of the screen with different colors. The player's color changes every 10 seconds and each segment has a designated color. You have to fill each segment with the correct color. The correct color is shown by a dot in each segment.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move your dot and paint the area.
